ftbquests.data.data.title: &b&lFrozenopolis
ftbquests.chapter.blblazingr_endgame_que: The power to change the weather is so close...
The power of the elements are mine
Use this on the weather changer to ride this world of the snow that falls
ftbquests.chapter.blhotr_wip_title.quest: Place model data in this and kill mobs whilst in your inventory to imporve the data model
The data model can then be palced inside a simulation chamber to simulate mob drops. You must have a basic model or higher for it to work
Right click on a mob that you want to start collecting data for
Used to duplicate certain mob drops
Used to covert nether predictions into ender ones
ftbquests.chapter.blhotr_wip_title.title: &b&lHot:&r Simulating Resources
ftbquests.chapter.blsubzero_24cr_placeho: Can be used to make lava
Can be used to make obsidian
An alloy of nickel and iron
Not the best way to find gold...
You can Break Snow Blocks For A chance To Obtain Gold Nuggets
ftbquests.chapter.flinformation.quests.1: &b+&r Be On The Look Out For Fruit Trees And Wild Crops For Food
&b+&r You Can Make Bowls Of Snow To Eat (Is Not Very Effective)
&b+&r FTB Ultimine is in the modpack hold the grave key to activate. Note that the correct tool is required for this to work
ftbquests.chapter.flinformation.quests.4: This Amazing Modpack Was Possible Thanks to a Collab Between &b&lBenbenlaw &rand &a&lCrypt1C
ftbquests.chapter.flinformation.title: &f&lInformation
ftbquests.chapter.lfsubchapter_1ar_from_: Uses mana to transform frozen stone into frozen ores
When broken with a pickaxe will drop raw ores
When broken with a pickaxe will drop raw ores, requires a copper tool or better
When broken with a pickaxe will drop coal
Made with the orechid from coarse dirt
Now You Are Thinking With HOPPERS !
When broken with a pickaxe will drop raw ores
There are 2 types of resource generator.
Resource Generator 1 is very slow but can also generate some items.

Resource Geneartor 2 requires the block you want to make to be placed on top. THis can also be sped up by placing speed blocks on top of the block you are generating. The opolis utilities guide book has more information on this.
Turning Snow and Ice into Valuable Resources!
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.6.descript: Right click on the pipe to set to extract mode
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.8.descript: Right click the water crystal to throw, water shards will come out when thrown
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.9.descript: Takes raw shards and turns them into useable source. must be placed on a element container
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.11.descrip: Made from water source and iron ingots
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.15.descrip: Right click the fire crystal to throw, fire shards will come out when thrown
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.16.descrip: Made from fire source and glass
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.21.descrip: A bigger storage for your source
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.22.descrip: Used to bind various items together. Items must be placed in the order thats in JEI
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.36.descrip: Require the 4 different pedestals around it
ftbquests.chapter.warm.quests.37.descrip: Requires a high amount of source to craft. Use the best pipes and have a large amount of source ready to go

ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.10.descrip: Can be used to light a campfire and set normal fires, keeps you warm
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.10.title: Not Quite A Flint And Steel
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.11.descrip: Logs can be burned on a campfire to make charcoal
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.11.title: Fuel Source !
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.12.descrip: Axes can be used to get logs
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.12.title: Wood For Days
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.13.descrip: Tourches Can Warm You Up If You Stand Near Them
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.13.title: I See Light !
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.14.descrip: A campfire can be used to break down a bone block into bones
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.14.title: ....May Break My Bones
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.16.descrip: Made on a campfire, can be used to make dirt
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.17.descrip: Snow and stone can be used to make calcite
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.18.descrip: Can be cooked on the campfire
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.21.descrip: Using the fertlizer on dirt will create mystical flowers
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.22.title: Mystical Flowers
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.23.descrip: White flowers can be made in the petal apothecary
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.23.title: Snow White
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.24.descrip: Any mystical flowers or petals can be used to make this
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.25.descrip: Green flowers can be made in the petal apothecary
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.25.title: Ever Green
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.26.title: Minty Fresh
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.27.title: Snowy Blossoms
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.28.title: Pure As Snow !
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.29.descrip: Can be used to turn dirt into grass, can effect area around the block
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.29.title: Haymaker's Mix
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.30.descrip: Using bone meal on grass will create flowers and grass. Breaking the tall grass blocks has a chance to drop seeds. Seeds caan also be found in the world
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.30.title: Start Of Every Farm
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.31.descrip: Wooden shears can be used to collect grass
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.34.descrip: Using a campfire will melt a bowl of ice into a bowl of water. This bowl can be used to fill the petal apothecary
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.35.descrip: Placing stone around a pure daisy will transform it into living rock
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.35.title: It's Alive !
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.36.descrip: Can be used to store mana
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.36.title: A Pool For Your Mana
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.37.descrip: Placing logs around a pure daisy will transform it into living log
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.37.title: It's Already Alive ?
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.38.title: A Piece Of My Heart
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.39.title: Transferring Mana
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.40.descrip: Used to link mana pools and spreaders together
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.40.title: Your Magic Wand
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.41.descrip: Learn The Art of Not Turning Into a Popsicle !
ftbquests.chapter.wood.quests.42.descrip: used for collecting tall grass and leaves
